mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_DIET(ID, QUANTITY, CREATED_TIME, DIET_TIME, USER_ID, DIET_ID, DIET_DATE) VALUES (SQ_USER_DIET.nextval, #{quantity}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{dietTime}, #{userId}, #{dietId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.DIET_TIME, A.DIET_DATE, B.TITLE,A.QUANTITY,(A.QUANTITY * B.CARBOHYDRATE), (A.QUANTITY * B.PROTEIN), (A.QUANTITY * B.FAT) FROM USER_DIET A, DIET B, TB_USER C WHERE A.USER_ID = C.ID AND A.DIET_ID= B.ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.DIET_TIME
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_DIET SET DIET_ID = #{dietId}, QUANTITY = #{quantity}, DIET_TIME = #{dietTime}, DIET_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ID=#{id}
